actions: Promotes the movement of Blood, invigorates the channels, reduces swelling and drains abscesses.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, disperses Wind, kills parasites and stops itching.
Relieves toxicity, dries Dampness, kills parasites, alleviates itching, restrains and inhibits sores, generates flesh and transforms putrefication.

symptoms: The scales and crusts are greasy
The lesions often exude an unpleasant odor
There may be fissures on and around the lesions that affect the nasolabial folds and behind the ears
Maybe pain in severe cases: Fever Chills Anhidrosis
Pain and stiffness of the head and neck
Sores that are red, swollen and painful

notes: Decoct and remove the dregs. Use a washcloth to repeatedly bathe the scalp with the warm decoction for 15 minutes. Apply twice a day every three days. For best results, cut the hair short.
